page.title: 04IVYTHORN FARM
page.content: The owner is Mr.Beaty who is 70,his son is 42 and works on the farm.They own about 230 acres of land,60 acres of it are used for {arable}and the rest is used for{dairy grazing.Their main types of arable are wheat,barley and maize.They have about 120 cows on about 170 acres.They don't have any out farms,but they do import grass from other farms.Mr.Beaty has a family of six,four of whom work on the farm,plus one worker. In one of their farm fields they have an electricity pump,but it is out of use,they also have their own water supply.Their milk output per year,is 600,000 litres,since they milk their cow at 6 a.m and 4 p.m daily.They spend Â£90,000 every year on the farm.Their machinery includes four tractors and two plough.
